document_data.name: The Dauntless Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dauntless Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Dauntless''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Activities: This mamluk organization specialized in exploration and the recovery of powerful magical items and artifacts.
document_data.Organization: The Dauntless were led by General [[Kemil Abd al-Jasir]].
document_data.Base of Operations: [[Qudra]] was the center of power for this organization, though they did maintain a strong presence in [[Huzuz]]. The [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]] was heavily supported by this group.
